name: @toldyaonce/kx-langchain-agent
description: Multi-tenant LangChain agent package for KxGen with multi-channel chat persistence

scripts.chat: tsx packages/cli/bin/kxagent.ts chat --tenantId dev-test --email dev@example.com --persona carlos --debug
scripts.simple-chat: tsx packages/cli/bin/kxagent.ts simple-chat --tenantId dev-test --email dev@example.com --persona carlos --debug
scripts.dev:chat: tsx watch --ignore node_modules --ignore .git --ignore '*.log' --ignore '.env*' packages/cli/bin/kxagent.ts simple-chat --tenantId dev-test --email dev@example.com --persona carlos --debug
scripts.dev:chat-stable: tsx packages/cli/bin/kxagent.ts simple-chat --tenantId dev-test --email dev@example.com --persona carlos --debug
scripts.test:goals: tsx packages/cli/bin/kxagent.ts test-goals --tenantId dev-test --email dev@example.com --persona carlos
scripts.test:model: tsx watch --ignore node_modules --ignore .git --ignore '*.log' --ignore '.env*' packages/cli/bin/kxagent.ts models test --model anthropic.claude-sonnet-4-20250514-v1:0 --prompt
